code: import React,{createContext,useContext,useState,useEffect}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UseContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();export const UseProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[selectedQuery,setSelectedQuery]=useState("");const[selectedReportTitle,setSelectedReportTitle]=useState("");const[selectedRecNo,setSelectedRecNo]=useState("");const[selectedInitRun,setSelectedInitRun]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{const localStorageKey="report_".concat(selectedRecNo);console.log(localStorageKey);console.log(selectedRecNo);const storedSelectedQuery=localStorage.getItem("".concat(localStorageKey,"_selectedQuery"));const storedSelectedReportTitle=localStorage.getItem("".concat(localStorageKey,"_selectedReportTitle"));const storedSelectedRecNo=localStorage.getItem("".concat(localStorageKey,"_selectedRecNo"));const storedSelectedInitRun=localStorage.getItem("".concat(localStorageKey,"_selectedInitRun"));if(storedSelectedQuery&&storedSelectedReportTitle&&storedSelectedRecNo&&storedSelectedInitRun){setSelectedQuery(storedSelectedQuery);setSelectedReportTitle(storedSelectedReportTitle);setSelectedRecNo(storedSelectedRecNo);setSelectedInitRun(storedSelectedInitRun);}},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UseContext.Provider,{value:{selectedQuery,setSelectedQuery,selectedReportTitle,setSelectedReportTitle,selectedRecNo,setSelectedRecNo,selectedInitRun,setSelectedInitRun},children:children});};export const useQuery=()=>useContext(UseContext);// TODO BURADA YAPMAM GEREKEN SET EDİLİRKEN KONTROL ETMESİ ÖRNEĞİN YENİ Bİ ŞEY SET EDİLCEKSE ESKİSİNE NİN RECnOSUNA baksın var ise set etmesin yok ise altına doğru set etmeli bunu nasıl yapcaz
